orange-day_one-default.text: Ah, Dr Pink! You have brightened my day with your presence
orange-day_one-default.speaker: orange

orange-day_one-default.text: I trust that we shall soon be clinking martinis in celebration of saving the world!
orange-day_one-default.speaker: orange

meeting_day_one-yes.text: (You have decided to sacrifice innocent lives to try to stop the moon)
meeting_day_one-yes.speaker: orange

meeting_day_one-no.text: (You have decided to not sacrifice innocent lives)
meeting_day_one-no.speaker: orange

meeting_day_two-yes.text: (It is now day two. Yesterday you decided to sacrifice innocent lives)
meeting_day_two-yes.speaker: orange

meeting_day_two-no.text: (It is now day two. Yesterday you decided to not sacrifice innocent lives)
meeting_day_two-no.speaker: orange
